lead_paragraph: COHEN--Lester, 85, died peacefully January 22. Loving husband of Carol, proud father of Andrew (Elizabeth) and Mark, and adoring grandfather of Lily and Julia. Funeral services Monday January 25 at 9:30am at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Home. 1/3
